3 510 593   = 0x00359141
3 510 593.0 = 0x4a564504

                  00        35        91        41
3 510 593 = 0b0000,0000|0011,0101|1001,0001|0100,0001
3 510 593/2^21 * 2^21 = 1.101011001000101000001 * 2^21
Bias = 2^(k-1) - 1 = 2^(7) - 1 = 127
E = e - Bias
21 = e - Bias
e = 21 + Bias = 21 + 127 = 148 = 0b10010100
s = 0
frac = 10101100100010100000100

0b0100,1010,0101,0110,0100,0101,0000,0100
0x4A564504
